aim_of_study: To assess the non-inferiority of oral apixaban compared to subcutaneous dalteparin for the treatment of newly diagnosed proximal DVT and/or PE in patients with cancer.
target_disease: newly diagnosed proximal deep vein thrombosis (DVT) and/or pulmonary embolism (PE) in patients with cancer
primary_efficacy_outcome: Non-inferiority of apixaban compared to dalteparin for the treatment of newly diagnosed proximal DVT and/or PE in cancer patients, based on time-to-event analysis.
